attributes.action: Assist Afghans at risk and UK citizens safely reach Kabul airport and the UK
attributes.additional_details: I have first-hand experience of living and working in Afghanistan as a charity worker. Even without this first-hand experience, people are shocked and dismayed at what is unfolding in Afghanistan. We all ask the government to act now to assist and enable all UK nationals and Afghans at risk safe passage to Kabul airport and successful evacuation.
attributes.background: There is video evidence of ongoing shocking scenes at Kabul airport, showing people desperately trying to access Kabul airport. Without assistance UK citizens & Afghans at risk will not be able to access the airport safely. Please provide  military intervention for evacuations to happen.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Redeploy UK Forces to Afghanistan to protect the citizens against the Taliban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594823

Help the people of Afghanistan: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723
